introduction.title: Where Art Meets Legacy
introduction.content: For over two decades, Aurelia Tradisia has been the premier destination for collectors seeking authentic Indian sculptures. Our curated collection spans ancient traditions to contemporary masters, each piece authenticated and sourced directly from renowned artisans.
introduction.alt: Luxurious gallery interior showcasing curated Indian sculptures

about.title: Our Story – Curating India's Finest Sculptures

hero.description: Founded by Jyotirmoy Barman, Aurelia Tradisia was born from a simple observation: India's most talented artists often create exceptional sculptures but struggle to reach the recognition and compensation they deserve. Inspired to bridge this gap, we began curating high-quality sculptures — from Indian deities to modern art — to bring local masterpieces to a national and global audience.

founder.name: Jyotirmoy Barman
founder.title: Founder & Curator
founder.description: Jyotirmoy Barman, founder of Aurelia Tradisia, has always been passionate about Indian art. Seeing the incredible craftsmanship of local artists often overlooked, he decided to create a platform that celebrates their talent and brings their work to discerning collectors worldwide.
founder.alt: Jyotirmoy Barman, founder of Aurelia Tradisia, in his curated gallery space

mission.title: The Inspiration
mission.description: India is home to thousands of skilled sculptors producing world-class work. Yet, most artists struggle to reach a wider audience or receive fair compensation. We wanted to change that.
mission.alt: Traditional Indian sculptor at work creating intricate bronze sculpture

mission.title: The Start of Aurelia Tradisia
mission.description: We started Aurelia Tradisia to bridge local artistry with national and global collectors. By curating over a thousand exceptional sculptures across categories — Indian deities, modern art, abstract, and various sizes — we give these masterpieces the platform they deserve.
mission.alt: Carefully curated collection of diverse Indian sculptures in elegant display

mission.title: Our Commitment
mission.description: Every piece in our collection is carefully selected for craftsmanship, authenticity, and artistic value. We strive to honor the artist, preserve India's cultural heritage, and offer collectors a truly unique experience.
mission.alt: Expert examination and authentication of traditional Indian sculpture

notice.title: Exclusive Viewing
notice.description: Our curated sculptures are not displayed publicly. Each piece in our collection has been carefully selected for its historical significance, artistic merit, and exceptional craftsmanship.
